title: Police: 12-year-old accidentally shot in Atlanta
content:
ATLANTA (CBS46) -
Police say a 12-year-old child was accidentally shot in Atlanta on New Year's Day.
A spokesperson with Atlanta police said units responded to the incident around 12:30 a.m. after the child's 38-year-old uncle unintentionally discharged a .357 handgun.
Police say the uncle was shot in the hand, while the child was shot in the chest, although not through the chest cavity, according to authorities.
Police say both victims were in stable condition before they were taken to the hospital.
